thread.title: Aigbogun: Wolves Can Win The League In 5 Games
thread.title_full: Aigbogun: Wolves Can Win The League In 5 Games

author: Prince Imehiron
title: Aigbogun: Wolves Can Win The League In 5 Games
text:
Nigeria League 
By Adeboye Amosu: 
Warri Wolves coach, Paul Aigbogun believes his side can still win the title despite falling five points behind Enyimba following Sunday’s 1-1 draw against Rangers in Enugu, reports Completesportsnigeria.com. 
The Seasiders face a tough task in their bid to win a first Glo Premier League title following the draw with only five games remaining before the end of the campaign. 
Aigbogun insists his side can still turn things around in the remaining games of the campaign. 
“We still have a good chance of winning the league despite trailing Enyimba by five points at the moment,” Aigbogun disclosed to Completesportsnigeria.com. 
“We gave our best against Rangers, and we are happy we didn’t lose the match. 
“We have five games to fight for the title and we will do our best to ensure we come out tops.” 
Warri Wolves will host Akwa United at the Warri City Stadium this weekend.
